Question: When asked if religion plays a part in her life, in an interview in 2009, this person replied, "I follow no doctrine.
Hints: The same year, this person also starred in Nancy Meyers' romantic comedy It's Complicated, with Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin.
This person's other film of 2008 was Doubt featuring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Amy Adams, and Viola Davis.
This person was born in Summit, New Jersey.
